element.hint: If the operation for the single queue item failed or was skipped, then this message is updated with details.
element.label: Message
element.name: message

element.hint: Data to be used in the operation for a given queue item, in other words, the changes to be applied.
element.label: Payload
element.name: payload

element.hint: Timestamp for when the change happened. This determines the order of the queue.
element.label: Sequence
element.name: sequence

element.hint: The queue item has been processed and successfully synced with other environment
element.label: Synced

element.hint: The queue item failed to be synced with other environment.
element.label: Failed

element.hint: The change has been inserted into the queue but no action has been taken on the item.
element.label: Queued

element.hint: It was determined no action was necessary for the queue item.
element.label: Skipped

element.hint: Name of the table where the change took place.
element.label: Table name
element.name: table
